analysis.description:
BlupassICO.contribute (/unique_chucks/22/0x740b0b2a581e1d4708b64e3a7e9dd70c79aaa542.sol#144-182) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-BLU.transfer(msg.sender,tokenBought) (/unique_chucks/22/0x740b0b2a581e1d4708b64e3a7e9dd70c79aaa542.sol#174)

BlupassICO.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x740b0b2a581e1d4708b64e3a7e9dd70c79aaa542.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-BLU.transfer(owner,remainder) (/unique_chucks/22/0x740b0b2a581e1d4708b64e3a7e9dd70c79aaa542.sol)

Reentrancy in BlupassICO.contribute (/unique_chucks/22/0x740b0b2a581e1d4708b64e3a7e9dd70c79aaa542.sol#144-182):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(BLU.balanceOf(this) >= tokenBought) (/unique_chucks/22/0x740b0b2a581e1d4708b64e3a7e9dd70c79aaa542.sol#170)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDistributed (/unique_chucks/22/0x740b0b2a581e1d4708b64e3a7e9dd70c79aaa542.sol#171-172)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x740b0b2a581e1d4708b64e3a7e9dd70c79aaa542.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.17 (/unique_chucks/22/0x740b0b2a581e1d4708b64e3a7e9dd70c79aaa542.sol#1): it allows old versions
